about_the_game:
This is additional content to support the developers, it does not change the gameplay.

Soundtracks for Fairy of the treasures.

DLC contains 5 tracks .mp3 and .flac (best quality).

Tracklist:

01. Amethyst theme [01:28]

02. Emerald theme [00:50]

03. Gold theme [01:01]

04. Ruby theme [01:22]

05. Sapphire theme [00:35]

After buy all sounds available in game folder (soundtrack).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
